articles.title: Dr Disrespect breaks his stream setup in rage with violence, speed & momentum - Dexerto
articles.description: Following a rough gulag match on Warzone, Dr Disrespect showed his violence, speed, and momentum by slamming his desk and breaking his mic.
articles.content:
Athletic superstar DrDisrespect showed off his strength on stream by slamming his desk during a game of Warzone with TimTheTatman and ZLaner. What he didn’t expect, is to break his own equipment.

articles.title: Germany wants Apple to update and repair iPhones for 7 years - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The German government thinks Apple should require security updates and spare parts for iPhone for at least seven years.
articles.content: A new environmental responsibility proposal from the German government to the European Union says Apple should require security updates and spare parts for iPhone for at least seven years. According … [+1797 chars]
